
Usage: esm-create-dist [packages] [options] [<output directory>]

Options:

  -h,    --help                Print this message.
  -i,    --ignore              Specify a pattern to ignore.
  -o,    --output              Specify the output directory.
  -t,    --preserve-tmp        Preserve the temporary build directory for debugging.
  -V,    --version             Print the package version.
